title: ∙ Does the competition for a game need help to distinguish the power of the horse from the "Lamathurt "?
subtitle: The viral memma shows a real moment of mental difficulty for one contestant on "Who wants to be a millionaire?"
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A contestant on "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire" needed the public's help in defining "the power of the horse" instead of "Lamathurst" and "the power of the zebra."
